name: Glitch DefendAIr
description:
Ever wondered what would happen if you were chilling in space...

and all of a sudden your virtual assistant was ejected?

In this action survival game, you must avoid the attacks using WASD to control your ship. Collect as many power - ups as you can.

This task is easier said then done, but worry not, as you have some AI-generated forcefields to protect you! Just, be carful you don't crash into them.  Oh, and did I mention that the AI can be a tad glitchy?
